name: Transgender Xanthe for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Transgender penis for personage Xanthe for the game Boobs 'em up.

This DLC include 5 different penis size.

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages. There is a button "Transgender" which turn on and off penis and change its size, so you can select which one you like.
